remarks: A real number smaller than the lower bound of a closed interval is not an element of the interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ltnelicc.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnelicc.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
ltnelicc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR* ) $.
ltnelicc.clta $e |- ( ph -> C < A ) $.
ltnelicc $p |- ( ph -> -. C e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
